Package frc.drive

Class DriveManager

java.lang.Object
frc.drive.DriveManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISubsystem
public class DriveManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISubsystem
Everything that has to do with driving is in here. There are a lot of auxilairy helpers and RobotToggles that feed in here.
See Also:
RobotTelemetry

    • updateTeleop

      public void updateTeleop() throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This is where driving happens. Call this every tick to drive and set RobotToggles.EXPERIMENTAL_DRIVE to change the drive stype
      Specified by:
      updateTeleop in interface ISubsystem
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if RobotToggles.EXPERIMENTAL_DRIVE is not implemented here or if you missed a break statement

    • drive

      public void drive​(double forward, double rotation)
      drives the robot based on -1 / 1 inputs (ie 100% forward and 100% turning)
      Parameters:
      forward - the percentage of max forward to do
      rotation - the percentage of max turn speed to do

    • drivePure

      FPS - Speed in Feet per Second
      omega - Rotation in Radians per Second

      rightFPS - Right drivetrain speed in feet per second
